Class HuffmanTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • BinaryTree
      • HuffmanTree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class HuffmanTree
extends BinaryTree
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class to represent and build a Huffman tree.
    Author:
    Koffman and Wolfgang
    See Also:

      • buildTree

        public void buildTree(HuffmanTree.HuffData[] symbols)
        Builds the Huffman tree using the given alphabet and weights. post: huffTree contains a reference to the Huffman tree.
        Parameters:
        symbols - An array of HuffData objects

      • decode

        public java.lang.String decode(java.lang.String codedMessage)
        Method to decode a message that is input as a string of digit characters '0' and '1'.
        Parameters:
        codedMessage - The input message as a String of zeros and ones.
        Returns:
        The decoded message as a String
